title: Train fault causing delays from Yew Tee to Jurong East

title_translations.zh-Hans: 列车故障导致油池至裕廊东延误
title_translations.ms: Gangguan kereta api menyebabkan kelewatan dari Yew Tee ke Jurong East
title_translations.ta: Yew Tee முதல் Jurong East வரை தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் தவறு

updates.text: UPDATE:Train service from Yew Tee towards Jurong East has been running well as of 8.40am
Trains from Yew Tee towards Jurong East are slightly delayed due to train fault.
